title: v1.6.3.9-v5 Documentation Update
details:
Updated documentation from v1.6.3.9-v4 to v1.6.3.9-v5 with bug fixes:

Key v5 Features (Bug Fixes & Reliability):
1. Tab ID Initialization - `currentBrowserTabId` fallback to background script
2. Storage Event Routing - `_routeInitMessage()` â†’ `_handleStorageChangedEvent()`
3. Adoption Flow Fallback - Handles null `currentBrowserTabId` gracefully
4. Response Format - Background responses include `type` and `correlationId`
5. Content Script Handlers - `QT_STATE_SYNC` and `STATE_REFRESH_REQUESTED`
6. MessageRouter Logging - Full context logged on routing failures
7. Tab Cleanup Listener - `browser.tabs.onRemoved` in Manager sidebar
8. Message Cross-Routing - Dispatcher handles both `type` and `action` fields

Files Updated: .github/copilot-instructions.md, README.md, 13 agent files (.github/agents/*.md)
